title: Salmon and leek parcels
ingredients: ['4 leeks, trimmed and thinly sliced', 'good pinch of sugar', '2 salmon fillets, about 300g each, skinned', '1 tbsp chopped fresh dill', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'To garnish (optional)', 'strips of thinly sliced lemon', 'sprigs of fresh dill']
